translationtableentry.text: Even surrounded, even outnumbered, even at a disadvantage, I have proven I could still achieve victory. Let this serve as a lesson for all the Gauls as well as those who wish to oppose me and the might of Rome!
translationtableentry.result: Sitiado, superado en número incluso, estando en desventaja, he demostrado que podía alcanzar la victoria. ¡Que esto sirva de lección a todos los galos y a aquellos que osen enfrentarse a mí y a Roma!
